title: Iibra, the Desert Thrifter
body:
Lore: Shurima has known it's fair share of brigands and bandits, but none so dangerous as the fearsome Iibra. He was a rogue that shifts along the sand dunes, and when he sees his chance, dives straight through his targets, not giving them even a chance to react before he has already sliced through them. Even the most armoured foes cannot withstand his blades, his attacks almost like sand, being able to slip under the plates of any metal and seep through even the smallest of cracks, his puncturing blades able to always find a break point. His greatest feat, however was his ability to rush in, and when cornered, fade away into the desert, a whole flurry of mirages covering his tracks as he fades from existence.

Passive: Sanded Edge
When Iibra critical strikes, be does not receive any bonus damage. Instead, all the damage is converted to True Damage. Additionally, Iibra takes time and patience before every crit, meaning that he has an X% reduction to Bonus Crit chance.

Q: Dust Dash
Iibra fades into the sands, becoming un-targetable while he dashes towards the target location. He deals X/X/X/X(+X% AD) physical damage to all enemies he passes through. Dust Dash can Crit. If Iibra crits with Dust Dash, he gains a Cooldown refresh. If he crits with any other abilities, X second cool down refresh to Dust Dash.

W: Crippling Daggers
Iibra throws out threw knives in a cone shape, each one dealing X/X/X/X(+X% AD) physical damage, and slows the enemy by X% for X seconds. Crippling Daggers can Crit. If Crippling Daggers Crits, the slow is doubled

E: Mirage Copy
Iibra spawns a replica of himself, which deals 0% of his damage, but takes the same amount he would. The replica lasts for X/X/X/X seconds. Every time Iibra lands a Crit, his replica will spawn another replica. Iibra can only have up to X/X/X/X replicas. These replicas will only spawn if there is at least one replica alive.

R: Dangerous Sands
Iibra becomes invisible for X/X/X seconds. While invisible he gains X% movement speed. If he attacks or uses an ability while invisible. It will deal X%/X%/X% of the targets max health as bonus physical damage. If Iibra crits while invisible, he will not break invisibility.
